## Chain explorer
[https://exp.nodeist.net/babylon](https://exp.nodeist.net/Babylon)

## Public endpoints

* api: [https://api-babylon.nodeist.net](https://api-babylon.nodeist.net)
* rpc: [https://rpc-babylon.nodeist.net](https://rpc-babylon.nodeist.net)

## Peering

**addrbook**
```bash
curl -Ls https://ss.nodeist.net/t/babylon/addrbook.json > $HOME/.babylond/config/addrbook.json
```

**live-peers**
```bash

sed -i -e "s|^persistent_peers *=.*|persistent_peers = \"$peers\"|" $HOME/.babylond/config/config.toml
```
